maqras.text: Qalu 'In Yasriq Faqad Saraqa 'Akhun Lahu Min Qablu Fa'asarraha Yusufu Fi Nafsihi Wa Lam Yubdiha Lahum Qala 'Antum Sharrun Makanaan Wa Allahu 'A`lamu Bima Tasifuna
Qalu Ya 'Ayyuha Al-`Azizu 'Inna Lahu 'Abaan Shaykhaan Kabiraan Fakhudh 'Ahadana Makanahu 'Inna Naraka Mina Al-Muhsinina
Qala Ma`adha Allahi 'An Na'khudha 'Illa Man Wajadna Mata`ana `Indahu 'Inna 'Idhaan Lazalimuna

Falamma Astay'asu Minhu Khalasu Najiyaan Qala Kabiruhum 'Alam Ta`lamu 'Anna 'Abakum Qad 'Akhadha `Alaykum Mawthiqaan Mina Allahi Wa Min Qablu Ma Farrattum Fi Yusufa Falan 'Abraha Al-'Arđa Hatta Ya'dhana Li 'Abi 'Aw Yahkuma Allahu Li Wa Huwa Khayru Al-Hakimina
Arji`u 'Ila 'Abikum Faqulu Ya 'Abana 'Inna Abnaka Saraqa Wa Ma Shahidna 'Illa Bima `Alimna Wa Ma Kunna Lilghaybi Hafizina
Wa As'ali Al-Qaryata Allati Kunna Fiha Wa Al-`Ira Allati 'Aqbalna Fiha Wa 'Inna Lasadiquna
Qala Bal Sawwalat Lakum 'Anfusukum 'Amraan Fasabrun Jamilun `Asa Allahu 'An Ya'tiyani Bihim Jami`aan 'Innahu Huwa Al-`Alimu Al-Hakimu
Wa Tawalla `Anhum Wa Qala Ya 'Asafa `Ala Yusufa Wa Abyađđat `Aynahu Mina Al-Huzni Fahuwa Kazimun
Qalu Ta-Allahi Tafta'u Tadhkuru Yusufa Hatta Takuna Harađaan 'Aw Takuna Mina Al-Halikina
Qala 'Innama 'Ashku Baththi Wa Huzni 'Ila Allahi Wa 'A`lamu Mina Allahi Ma La Ta`lamuna
Ya Baniya Adh/habu Fatahassasu Min Yusufa Wa 'Akhihi Wa La Tay'asu Min Rawhi Allahi 'Innahu La Yay'asu Min Rawhi Allahi 'Illa Al-Qawmu Al-Kafiruna
Falamma Dakhalu `Alayhi Qalu Ya 'Ayyuha Al-`Azizu Massana Wa 'Ahlana Ađ-Đurru Wa Ji'na Bibiđa`atin Muzjaatin Fa'awfi Lana Al-Kayla Wa Tasaddaq `Alayna 'Inna Allaha Yajzi Al-Mutasaddiqina
Qala Hal `Alimtum Ma Fa`altum Biyusufa Wa 'Akhihi 'Idh 'Antum Jahiluna
Qalu 'A'innaka La'anta Yusufu Qala 'Ana Yusufu Wa Hadha 'Akhi Qad Manna Allahu `Alayna 'Innahu Man Yattaqi Wa Yasbir Fa'inna Allaha La Yuđi`u 'Ajra Al-Muhsinina
Qalu Ta-Allahi Laqad 'Atharaka Allahu `Alayna Wa 'In Kunna Lakhati'ina
Qala La Tathriba `Alaykumu Al-Yawma Yaghfiru Allahu Lakum Wa Huwa 'Arhamu Ar-Rahimina
Adh/habu Biqamisi Hadha Fa'alquhu `Ala Wajhi 'Abi Ya'ti Basiraan Wa 'Tuni Bi'ahlikum 'Ajma`ina
Wa Lamma Fasalati Al-`Iru Qala 'Abuhum 'Inni La'ajidu Riha Yusufa Lawla 'An Tufanniduni
Qalu Ta-Allahi 'Innaka Lafi Đalalika Al-Qadimi
Falamma 'An Ja'a Al-Bashiru 'Alqahu `Ala Wajhihi Fartadda Basiraan Qala 'Alam 'Aqul Lakum 'Inni 'A`lamu Mina Allahi Ma La Ta`lamuna
Qalu Ya 'Abana Astaghfir Lana Dhunubana 'Inna Kunna Khati'ina
Qala Sawfa 'Astaghfiru Lakum Rabbi 'Innahu Huwa Al-Ghafuru Ar-Rahimu
Falamma Dakhalu `Ala Yusufa 'Awa 'Ilayhi 'Abawayhi Wa Qala Adkhulu Misra 'In Sha'a Allahu 'Aminina

Wa Rafa`a 'Abawayhi `Ala Al-`Arshi Wa Kharru Lahu Sujjadaan Wa Qala Ya 'Abati Hadha Ta'wilu Ru'uya Y Min Qablu Qad Ja`alaha Rabbi Haqqaan Wa Qad 'Ahsana Bi 'Idh 'Akhrajani Mina As-Sijni Wa Ja'a Bikum Mina Al-Badwi Min Ba`di 'An Nazagha Ash-Shaytanu Bayni Wa Bayna 'Ikhwati 'Inna Rabbi Latifun Lima Yasha'u 'Innahu Huwa Al-`Alimu Al-Hakimu
